drinks.name: Mojito
drinks.description: A mojito is a traditional Cuban cocktail made with rum, lime juice, sugar, mint, and soda water. It is a refreshing drink that is perfect for hot weather.

drinks.name: Margarita
drinks.description: A margarita is a cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur. It is often served with salt on the rim of the glass.

drinks.name: Pina Colada
drinks.description: A piña colada is a cocktail made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. It is a sweet and tropical drink that is perfect for summer.

drinks.name: Old Fashioned
drinks.description: An old fashioned is a cocktail made with whiskey, sugar, and bitters. It is a classic drink that is often garnished with an orange slice and a cherry.

drinks.name: Cosmopolitan
drinks.description: A cosmopolitan is a cocktail made with vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice. It is a popular drink that is often served in a martini glass.

drinks.name: Daiquiri
drinks.description: A daiquiri is a cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and sugar. It is a refreshing drink that can be served frozen or shaken.

drinks.name: Mai Tai
drinks.description: A mai tai is a cocktail made with rum, lime juice, orange liqueur, and orgeat syrup. It is a fruity and tropical drink that is often garnished with mint.

drinks.name: Bellini
drinks.description: A bellini is a cocktail made with Prosecco and peach purée. It is a light and refreshing drink that is perfect for brunch.

drinks.name: Sangria
drinks.description: Sangria is a Spanish drink made with red wine, fruit, and brandy. It is a fruity and refreshing drink that is perfect for summer.

drinks.name: Moscow Mule
drinks.description: A Moscow mule is a cocktail made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice. It is a spicy and refreshing drink that is often served in a copper mug.

drinks.name: Whiskey Sour
drinks.description: A whiskey sour is a cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar. It is a tart and refreshing drink that is often garnished with a cherry.

food.name: mushroom risotto
food.description: Mushroom risotto is a creamy Italian rice dish made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, broth, and Parmesan cheese. It is a comforting and flavorful dish that is perfect for a cozy dinner.

food.name: Caesar Salad
food.description: Caesar salad is a classic salad made with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. It is a crisp and refreshing salad that is perfect as a side dish.

food.name: Pad Thai
food.description: Pad Thai is a popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish made with rice noodles, shrimp or chicken, peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime. It is a flavorful and satisfying dish that is perfect for lunch or dinner.

food.name: Sushi
food.description: Sushi is a Japanese dish made with vinegared rice, raw fish, and vegetables. It is a light and healthy dish that is perfect for a quick meal.

food.name: Tacos
food.description: Tacos are a traditional Mexican dish made with a folded or rolled tortilla filled with various ingredients such as meat, beans, cheese, and vegetables. They are a flavorful and satisfying dish that is perfect for lunch or dinner.
